name: DevCrit's place for front line toons.
author: illcat

posts.author: illcat
posts.content: I was going through some of the level 40 builds and I noticed a lot of them lack dev crit and I was curious what was going on there? When I played back in the day it seemed like every melee toon had dev crit and there were a lot of builds that were Monk(or rogue)/WM/Fighter, especially in modules that disallowed RDD though you'd mostly go Bard/RDD/?? for Dev critting everything in your way on other servers.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Lots of PWs and even some single-player mods will disable or nerf Dev Crit.
